content:
# The error indicates that I attempted to insert Coal into the Stone Furnace, but it seems that I no longer have any Coal in my inventory. 
# This suggests that I may have exhausted my Coal supply during previous operations, which is why the furnace is reporting "NO FUEL."

# To resolve this issue, I need to locate a Coal resource patch and gather more Coal. 
# I will first find the nearest Coal resource and then move to that location to harvest some Coal.

# Let's find the nearest Coal resource patch.
coal_resource_position = nearest(Resource.Coal)  # Finding the nearest Coal resource patch.
move_to(coal_resource_position)  # Moving to the Coal resource patch.

# After reaching the Coal patch, I will harvest a sufficient amount of Coal to fuel the Stone Furnace.
harvested_coal_quantity = 10  # Harvesting 10 units of Coal.
harvest_resource(position=coal_resource_position, quantity=harvested_coal_quantity)  # Harvesting Coal.

# Once I have gathered the Coal, I will check my inventory to confirm the addition of Coal.
print(f"Inventory after harvesting Coal: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking inventory after harvesting Coal.
